properties.description: Old church building - running a community day for people to come to where they can chat, do activities or sit quietly with a hot drink.
properties.title: Mind in Somerset

properties.address: St. Peters Community Centre, Yeovil, Somerset BA21 3DY
properties.description: ALWAYS OPEN INCLUDING WARM HUB THROUGHOUT THE WINTER MONTHS! Here to provide a community warm hub, all welcome. Catering for ALL. Daily papers, puzzles,magazines, a lounge area, a dining area, childrens play space, library all free to use. We also run a food hub within the cafe area in the community centre. the lunches are cooked fresh everyday made to order, and free! Monday to Thursday food served 12.15 - 1,15pm. Hot drinks available from 9.30am until 2.30pm daily. DONATION BASED HOT MEALS.
properties.title: St Peter's Community Centre, Westfield

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 7th November 2023** All are welcome for Tea, Coffee, Biscuits, Soup, Roll & Cheese.
properties.title: Warm Space

properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. Our Winter Coat Exchange runs from October – March. You can donate coats, or simply take one for free if you need it. Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning , iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
properties.title: Yeovil Library

hours._text: Monday to thursday 09.30am until 3pm. food served monday tuesday and wednesday

properties.address: St James' Corner, South Petherton, TA13 5BS
